abstract: Permira announced Monday it reached an agreement to purchase Asia Broadcast Satellite from a Citigroup venture fund. The Britain-based buyout fund, which is partnering with Asia Broadcast’s management on the deal, is paying about $200 million for the company in an all-equity deal.

lead_paragraph: Permira announced Monday that it had reached an agreement to purchase Asia Broadcast Satellite from a Citigroup venture fund. The Britain-based buyout fund, which is partnering with Asia Broadcast’s management on the deal, is paying about $200 million for the company in an all-equity transaction.

headline.main: Permira in Deal for Citigroup Satellite Broadcaster
